channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Reaching new heights: How Brightpick’s Giraffe can lift warehouse efficiency
item.description: Jan Zizka describes Brightpick's innovative Giraffe Autopicker, and Charlie Kemp explains Hello Robot's mobile manipulator. The post Reaching new heig...

item.title: I have early Alzheimer’s and my husband has stage 4 kidney disease. We just inherited $50K. How can this help us?
item.description: “We have a 401(k) with $20,000, and $29,000 in a Roth IRA.”

item.title: Waymo reaches 100M fully autonomous miles across all deployments
item.description: Waymo currently operates fully autonomous robotaxi services in Phoenix, San Francisco, Los Angeles, and Austin. The post Waymo reaches 100M fully auto...

item.title: Lucid, Nuro, Uber team up on global robotaxi fleet
item.description: As part of a deepening relationship with each partner, Uber plans to make multi-hundred-million dollar investments in both Nuro and Lucid. The post Lu...

item.title: ‘We are acquaintances, not friends’: My neighbors need somewhere to stay after a house fire. Do I say yes?
item.description: “We feel obliged to offer our house to this couple to live in while they deal with this horrible experience.”

item.title: The Download: how to run an LLM, and a history of “three-parent babies”
item.description: This is today’s edition of The Download, our weekday newsletter that provides a daily dose of what’s going on in the world of technology. How to run a...

item.title: My husband’s brother left his $600K estate to a friend. Can we contest the will? He experienced oxygen deprivation due to COPD.
item.description: “Around 30 days before passing, he changed everything to go to a friend.”

item.title: Trump signs the Genius Act into law, in significant step for U.S. crypto regulation
item.description: President Trump said the crypto industry was once “mocked and dismissed and counted out,” but now could become a big buyer of U.S. government debt.

item.title: Salesforce used AI to cut support load by 5% — but the real win was teaching bots to say ‘I’m sorry’
item.description: Salesforce reached 1 million AI-powered customer conversations, showcasing breakthroughs in enterprise automation, AI empathy, and next-generation cus...

item.title: American Express earnings show healthy spending — including on these fancy categories
item.description: Amex saw 7% growth in spending last quarter. Spending on front-of-cabin plane tickets was up even more than that.

item.title: A major AI training data set contains millions of examples of personal data
item.description: Millions of images of passports, credit cards, birth certificates, and other documents containing personally identifiable information are likely inclu...

item.title: A brief history of “three-parent babies”
item.description: This week we heard that eight babies have been born in the UK following an experimental form of IVF that involves DNA from three people. The approach ...

item.title: OpenAI unveils ‘ChatGPT agent’ that gives ChatGPT its own computer to autonomously use your email and web apps, download and create files for you
item.description: If a website needs you to log in, you can do that securely through a special browser view, which lets the agent dig deeper and handle more.

item.title: Loomia Smart Skin Developer Kit to help give humanoid robots a sense of touch
item.description: Loomia created its tactile sensing developer kit after surveying 100 engineers as part of the NSF I-Corps program. The post Loomia Smart Skin Develope...

item.title: Mistral’s Le Chat adds deep research agent and voice mode to challenge OpenAI’s enterprise dominance
item.description: Mistral added deep research capabilities to its Le Chat platform, bringing it in direct competition against ChatGPT and Gemini.

item.title: Slack gets smarter: New AI tools summarize chats, explain jargon, and automate work
item.description: Slack launches comprehensive AI features including enterprise search and writing assistance as Salesforce challenges Microsoft's workplace AI dominanc...

item.title: Blaxel raises $7.3M seed round to build ‘AWS for AI agents’ after processing billions of agent requests

item.description: Bedrock said its technology bridges the expanding gap between rapidly rising domestic infrastructure needs and shrinking workforce capacity. The post ...
